name: thesaurus-widget
description: This is a widget that can interact with a thesaurus api to select concepts.
author: Onroerend Erfgoed <ict@onroerenderfgoed.be> (https://www.onroerenderfgoed.be/)

scripts.postbuild:amd: cross-env copyfiles --up 1 src/**/*.html src/**/*.css src/**/*.scss dist/amd
scripts.postbuild:commonjs: cross-env copyfiles --up 1 src/**/*.html src/**/*.css src/**/*.scss dist/commonjs
scripts.build:es2017: cross-env tsc --project tsconfig.build.json --outDir dist/es2017 --module es2015 --target es2017
scripts.postbuild:es2017: cross-env copyfiles --up 1 src/**/*.html src/**/*.css src/**/*.scss dist/es2017
scripts.build:es2015: cross-env tsc --project tsconfig.build.json --outDir dist/es2015 --module es2015 --target es2015
scripts.postbuild:es2015: cross-env copyfiles --up 1 src/**/*.html src/**/*.css src/**/*.scss dist/es2015
scripts.postbuild:native-modules: cross-env copyfiles --up 1 src/**/*.html src/**/*.css src/**/*.scss dist/native-modules
scripts.postbuild:system: cross-env copyfiles --up 1 src/**/*.html src/**/*.css src/**/*.scss dist/system
scripts.build: concurrently "npm run build:amd" "npm run build:commonjs" "npm run build:es2015" "npm run build:es2017" "npm run build:native-modules" "npm run build:system" "npm run gulp"
scripts.predoc: cross-env rimraf doc/api.json && cross-env rimraf dist/doc-temp && cross-env tsc --project tsconfig.build.json --outFile dist/doc-temp/${npm_package_name}.js --module amd && node doc/shape-defs && copyfiles tsconfig.json dist/doc-temp
scripts.doc: cross-env typedoc --json doc/api.json --excludeExternals --includeDeclarations --mode modules --target ES6 --name ${npm_package_name}-docs dist/doc-temp/
scripts.prepare-release: cross-env npm run changelog && npm run build && npm run doc
